newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Dec first 10 days trade surplus falls 96.6%.
newsitem.headline: Japan Dec first 10 days trade surplus falls 96.6%.

text.p: Japan's customs-cleared trade surplus fell 96.6 percent to 8.07 billion yen in the first 10 days of December compared with a revised surplus of 237.07 billion yen in the same period a year earlier, the Finance Ministry announced on Thursday.
Free-on-board (FOB) exports rose 4.4 percent to 1.19 trillion yen from a year earlier, while cost, insurance and freight (CIF) imports rose 31.0 percent to 1.18 trillion yen.
